name: 程耀毅
objective: This course will introduce foundmental principle, property and application of materials including metal, ceramic, polymer and composite. Several topics will be discussed, including crystal structure, solidification, crystalline imperfections, atomic diffusion in solids, and basic mechanical properties.
schedule:
1.Introduction
2.Atomic structure and bonding
3.Crystal structure
4.Solidification
5.Crystalline Imperfection
6.Diffusion in solids
7.Mecanical properties of metal
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance(20%)
Mid-term and Fianl Exam(80%)
materials:
Foundation of materials science and engineering
by William F. Smith
